lead.title: ECG Apptitude
lead.text: A specialist application for cardiac education and practice

sections.title: client
sections.text: The UCT Cardiac Clinic is the oldest dedicated clinical cardiology unit in sub-Saharan Africa, and is internationally respected as a leading cardiac center for its  academic excellence  and outstanding  tertiary and quaternary cardiology care, clinical research conduct, and post graduate clinical and clinical-research training.

sections.title: project description
sections.text:
The application software puts easy to use accurate information in the hands of cardiac professionals and students.
The content is intended for use as both a way to further your knowledge and a reference on the job in six languages.
Backend authoring tools support multiple languages, structure, image and video content. All content is automatcially refrenced and indexed.
A Mobile application allows off-line access to reference materials, notes and classes.

sections.title: my role
sections.text: I designed and implemented the authoring and mobile tools for all apsects of the project.

sections.title: technology
sections.text: Backend storage is provided by Google Firebase. Authoring tools are coded in angular for the browser. Mobile device software is developed with Ionic for Android and iOS devices.

sections.title: current status
sections.text: The software is in daily use by more than ten thousand specilist doctors and students.
